DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect brexpiprazole sleep pattern depress patient sleep disturbance .
DOC.brief_title: Study Brexpiprazole Adjunctive Treatment Sleep Disturbances Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Screening : The patient Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) associate Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) , diagnose accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR™ ) . The current MDE confirm use Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient inadequate response least one antidepressant treatment ( include treatment patient take screen ) current MDE , document selfreport less predefined response Massachusetts General Hospital Antidepressant Treatment Response Questionnaire ( ATRQ ) . The patient predefined Montgomery Aasberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) total score , predefined Clinical Global Impression Severity Illness ( CGIS ) score screening , current MDE ≥10 week . The patient currently treat current MDE adequate selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) serotoninnorepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRI ) antidepressant treatment ≥6 week , dosage ≥2 week . The patient sleep disturbance ( difficulty fall asleep and/or difficulty stay asleep and/or problem wake early ) confirm predefined Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) score . The patient agree protocoldefined use effective contraception . Entry Criteria Treatment Period ( Baseline Visit ) : The patient still fulfil DSMIVTR™ criterion MDE . The patient receive SSRI SNRI antidepressant treatment adequate dose entire leadin period . The patient predefined MADRS total score . The patient 's improvement MADRS total score predefined percentage compare screening . The patient predefined Clinical Global Impression Global Improvement ( CGII ) score . The patient sleep disturbance ( difficulty fall asleep and/or difficulty stay asleep and/or problem wake early ) confirm predefined ISI score . The patient sleep disturbance confirm predefined Latency Persistent Sleep ( LPS ) predefined Sleep Efficiency ( SE ) . The patient , investigator 's opinion , unlikely comply protocol unsuitable reason . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
